What is Gritmail?

Gritmail is your ultimate dining companion at UMBC, designed to make your life easier and mealtimes hassle-free. Our innovative web application allows you to effortlessly preorder your favorite meals from the campus dining hall. With just a few clicks, you can log in, browse the menu, select your cravings, and place your order for a quick and convenient pickup. Say goodbye to long lines and wasted time!

We know student life can be hectic. Between back-to-back classes, unexpected illnesses, or those days when you're just swamped with responsibilities, finding time to eat can feel impossible. Thatâ€™s why we created Gritmail: a service designed by students, for students. We're here to ensure you never have to choose between fueling your body and staying on top of your busy schedule. Let Gritmail handle the logistics while you focus on crushing your goals.
